node.title: Meet the young leaders behind some of Australia's most successful companies
node.description: The tech industry is behind many of Australia's newest millionaires and fastest growing companies. Here's how three Australian entrepreneurs made it.Â
node.content:
["When Kate Morris decided to start selling make-up online as a uni student in the late 1990s, not everyone was enthusiastic about the idea.", "\"The response I got a lot of the time was, 'Oh no, people aren't going to want to buy beauty products on the internet ... that's not really going to work,'\" she told 7.30.", "\"It was kind of really just in the very, very early days where online shopping was a bit of an idea. And not many people had actually done it or bought anything online.\"", "Ms Morris said the company's success was a long time \u2014 and a lot of work \u2014 in the making.", "", "
Online shopping was still a new concept when Kate Morris launched Adore Beauty.(Supplied: Kate Morris)
", "\"At the start it was pretty lo-fi,\" she said.", "\"So yes, it was humble beginnings.\"", "Two decades on, Melbourne-based Adore Beauty has become an online cosmetics behemoth that debuted on the ASX last year as one of 2020's biggest IPOs.", "But its 42-year-old founder told 7.30 her $400 million company still feels like a start-up.", "\"If you look at e-commerce in Australia versus other more advanced markets, there's still so far to go,\" she said.", "\"And when you're moving quickly and innovating and doing new things and building teams, it does still feel very much like a start-up.\"", "", "
Kate Morris's business Adore Beauty has come a long way from its humble beginnings.(Supplied:\u00a0Kate Morris)
", "As Australians hunkered down during COVID-19 lockdowns over the past two years, the company saw its sales spike.", "\"We saw some really interesting trends during lockdowns. And because I guess we had so many lockdowns here (in Melbourne), we got to see it predictably happen.", "\"We used to call it the scented candle index ...\u00a0the number of scented candles that we were selling directly correlated to how bad people were feeling around lockdown.\"", "
Airtasker success began with a simple idea
", "", "
Tim Fung's business Airtasker is now worth almost $400 million.(ABC News: Shaun Kingma)
", "Tim Fung's hugely successful business Airtasker was also built on the floor of his Sydney home, when he and his co-founder came across a common problem.", "\"I was moving apartments back in 2011 and I asked a friend of mine to come over and help me move,\" the 37-year-old said.", "A decade on from the app's conception, Airtasker is now listed on the ASX and worth almost $400 million.", "", "
Tim didn't come from an entrepreneurial background, but he enjoyed solving problems.(Supplied: Tim Fung)
", "\"I didn't really come from an entrepreneurial background,\" Mr Fung told 7.30 from the company's headquarters, where several Groodles were roaming in between office desks.", "\"Following university, I was involved in various problem solving and some of those things turned into businesses.\"", "The app allows anyone to outsource everyday tasks \u2014\u00a0like installing furniture \u2014 and is part of what's been called the gig economy.", "Like other companies in the gig economy, Airtasker has faced criticism for its business model, where those who complete tasks are independent contractors who simply use the platform to connect with customers, and are not employed on a wage by the company.", "However, Mr Fung argued Airtasker's platform was fundamentally different from other gig economy companies like ridesharing or food delivery platforms.", "", "
Tim Fung with Airtasker co-founder Jonathan Lui.(Supplied: Tim Fung)
", "\"The gig economy I would characterise as largely like standardising labour,\" he said.", "\"I think that when you're talking about things like food delivery, and ridesharing apps, it's the platforms\u00a0that are determining the price of the work, the type of work that's being done, and really who does that work.", "\"We don't determine the price of the jobs. That's completely determined by the customer and the service provider.", "\"I think it's just a very different mission and a very different business model that underlies that.\"", "
The 'fashion crime' sold around the world
", "", "
Davie Fogarty wearing the Oodie, a wearable blanket made from flannel and Sherpa fleece.(Supplied:\u00a0Davie Fogarty)
", "Davie Fogarty, 27, also found success through unconventional means \u2014\u00a0via a colourful wearable blanket that has been referred to as \"one of Australia's biggest fashion crimes\".", "Millions of the fleecy garment,\u00a0known as the Oodie,\u00a0have now sold around the world \u2014\u00a0and it too saw sales spike during lockdown, with people spending more time at home in loungewear.", "Mr Fogarty rejects the fashion crime label.", "\"I think they don't look that bad,\" he told 7.30.", "\"People are starting to wear them down the street. So hopefully\u00a0it'll soon be sensible office attire and our mission will be done.\"", "", "
Davie Fogarty has been coming up with business ideas since he was a child.(Supplied: Davie Fogarty)
", "Mr Fogarty has graced the Financial Review's Young Rich List with an estimated wealth of $170 million \u2014\u00a0largely due to the jumpers.", "But he prefers not to talk about money.", "\"You know, I don't think it's really about money anymore ... It's more about doing things we enjoy and creating new products,\" he said.\u00a0", "The product idea was born about four years ago by the Adelaide-based entrepreneur, who said his path to success hasn't been easy and followed a string of failed ventures before the Oodie.", "\"Whether it was vain or not, I always thought I'd be successful, even in high school.\u00a0I kind of was always dedicated to this path.\"", "", "
Davie Fogarty says his parents have supported his business ideas from a young age.(Supplied: Davie Fogarty)
", "While he said he launched the company with just $500, Mr Fogarty acknowledged his parents played a key role in supporting his entrepreneurial endeavours over the years.", "\"They've obviously been incredibly vital to my businesses,\" he said.", "\"They supported me from a very young age, even with another business that didn't work out.\"", "
Challenges remain
", "Despite her success at Adore Beauty, Ms Morris told 7.30 she still faces hurdles as a female founder in Australia.", "\"Even though it's well documented that businesses that have a woman co-founder ... actually performed better on every different metric.\"", "Ms Morris said the start-up\u00a0industry also faces much broader challenges that are holding the country back \u2014 most notably, Australia's notorious tall poppy syndrome and what she describes as our \"fear of failure\".", "", "
Kate Morris says there are challenges that are holding Australians back in the start-up industry.(ABC News:\u00a0Kyle Harley)
", "\"I think that's still a little bit ingrained in Australia, and it makes us a bit more risk-averse,\" she said.", "\"You certainly become very aware of [it],\u00a0and I think this affects women disproportionately \u2014\u00a0once you achieve any level of success, [there is]\u00a0the extra scrutiny, or\u00a0perhaps suspicion, of that.", "\"So I think that's a challenge for Australia, if we really actually do want to celebrate the people who are trying really hard and putting everything on the line to achieve that.\"", "Airtasker CEO Tim Fung said Australia should shout its successes \"from the rooftops\" and acknowledge the role of home-grown entrepreneurs and innovators.", "\"When you go to places like Silicon Valley or to Israel, they're constantly talking about all the success that they've had,\" he said.", "\"And when I look back at Australia, we invented wi-fi \u2014\u00a0that's one of the biggest inventions.", "\"I think showcasing these [success stories]\u00a0is really important, because it normalises it, and it lets people know, hey, this is something that I could do.\u00a0", "\"I could get a full-time job, or I could give it a crack.\"", "Watch this story on ABC iview.\u00a0"]
